title: Resource Consumption Metrics (RCM) Sub-Schema
description: Standard structure for reporting resource consumption, designed to be used as the value for the 'context_data' field in GGS_V2 logs when resource usage tracking is required.

cpu_cycles_ms.description: CPU utilization/processing time measured in milliseconds (per instance).

gpu_cycles_ms.description: GPU acceleration usage time in milliseconds, if applicable.

latency_ms.description: Total end-to-end processing latency for the span being measured.

estimated_cost_usd.description: Estimated monetary cost attributed to this specific action, critical for CAC tracking.
